data.name: RPG Maker MZ - World Music Pack Vol.1
data.detailed_description:
About this World Music Pack

This second official DLC was released by North Sound that provided the various songs included in RPG Maker MZ and RPG Maker MV!
This pack contains 26 multinational BGMs for Battle, field, scene, etc., that dynamically and powerfully produce a variety of effects are included!
Also included are 24 ME tracks to evoke scenes to match!
As a bonus for purchasing this pack, this Pack includes 15 newly written remixes and SEs of DLC_FMP1_Theme1 from the previously released Fantasy Music Pack Vol. 1!
You can create a wide world like harbors and deserts with this pack!

Extensions: Ogg 128kbps, Ogg 500kbps


Available at: *******************************************

BGM:
Theme music: 2
Battle music: 4
End of Battle Music: 3
Music for inside the castle: 1
Music for Dungeon : 3
Music for Field : 3
Music for scene : 4
Music for town : 4
Music for vehicles: 2
Bonus track: 1

ME: 24 songs

Total 51 songs

Purchase bonus SE: 15
*******************************************
